## Resource Attributes

| Name | Description | Values | Enabled |
| ---- | ----------- | ------ | ------- |
| host.id | The unique host identifier | Any Str | true |
| host.name | The hostname | Any Str | true |
| process.pid | The process identifier | Any Int | true |
